mapper.select: SELECT W_NO, W_NAME, W_KIND, W_LOCATION, W_VINTAGE, W_AVG, W_REVIEWS, W_IMAGE, W_WINEERY FROM WINE WHERE W_NO = #{w_no}
SELECT * FROM STORE S LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON S.S_NO = WL.S_NO LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO WHERE WL.W_NO = #{w_no} ORDER BY WL.W_AMOUNT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE W.W_NAME LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{name_Search}) || '%' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 OR W.W_NAME LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{name_Search}) || '%' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 OR W.W_NAME LIKE '%' || INITCAP(#{name_Search}) || '%' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ORDER BY WL.WL_IDX ASC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ORDER BY WL.WL_IDX ASC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE W_KIND = 'RED' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ORDER BY WL.WL_IDX ASC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE W_KIND = 'WHITE' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ORDER BY WL.WL_IDX ASC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE W_KIND = 'SPARKLING' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ORDER BY WL.WL_IDX ASC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE W_KIND = 'ROSE' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ORDER BY WL.WL_IDX ASC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT W.*, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NO FROM WINE W LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON WL.S_NO = S.S_NO WHERE W_KIND = 'DESSERT' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 OR W_KIND = 'PORT' AND WL.WL_IDX >= 1 ORDER BY WL.WL_IDX ASC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WINELIST WL LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WINELIST WL LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO WHERE W.W_KIND = 'RED'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WINELIST WL LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO WHERE W.W_KIND = 'WHITE'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WINELIST WL LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO WHERE W.W_KIND = 'SPARKLING'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WINELIST WL LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO WHERE W.W_KIND = 'ROSE'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WINELIST WL LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO WHERE W.W_KIND = 'DESSERT' OR W.W_KIND = 'PORT'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WINELIST WL LEFT JOIN WINE W ON W.W_NO = WL.W_NO WHERE W.W_NAME LIKE '%' || INITCAP(#{searchKeyword}) || '%'
